description: Designed and implemented responsive, user-friendly UI components for the BRAVO C2 app using React.js.
Developed a dynamic case upload system allowing users to upload videos via local file system, DVR integration, or webcam capture.
Implemented a case management interface to list uploaded cases with an interactive thumbnail preview and modal popup functionality for quick content review.
Built a responsive video analytics dashboard with a collapsible left sidebar for object palette and a right sidebar for image preview.
Engineered bounding box detection for objects in video streams with checkbox-controlled timeline highlights, syncing object appearance time to the video player.
Designed a timeline-linked video interaction system: clicking on detected object instances in the timeline dynamically seeks the video to the corresponding timestamp.
Used React.js, Tailwind CSS, and video.js for seamless UI/UX and video rendering capabilities.
